10:
Raises the following discovery level by [Digit:2digits ]:
• [Name:ExpeditionRewardCategory ]
20:
Raises the following discovery levels by [Digit:2digits ]:
• [Name:ExpeditionRewardCategory Idx="1" ]
• [Name:ExpeditionRewardCategory Idx="2" ]
30:
Raises the following discovery level by [Digit:2digits Idx="1" ]:
• [Name:ExpeditionRewardCategory Idx="1" ]

Lowers the following discovery level by [Digit:2digits Idx="2" ]:
• [Name:ExpeditionRewardCategory Idx="2" ]
50:
Raises the following discovery level by [Digit:2digits Idx="1" ]:
• [Name:ExpeditionRewardCategory Idx="1" ]

Lowers the following discovery levels by [Digit:2digits Idx="2" ]:
• [Name:ExpeditionRewardCategory Idx="2" ]
• [Name:ExpeditionRewardCategory Idx="3" ]
70:
Raises the following discovery level by [Digit:2digits Idx="2" ] when
a team is formed with [Digit:2digits Idx="1" ] or more sync pairs that
share the [Name:TeamSkillTag ] theme:
• [Name:ExpeditionRewardCategory ]
80:
Raises the following discovery level by the
number of sync pairs that share the
[Name:TeamSkillTag ] theme:
• [Name:ExpeditionRewardCategory ]
